title: Vitamin C
fields: Vitamin C is a great supplement to add to any roll stack as it is common and cheap. [It shows promise as a neuroprotective agent when taken with MDMA.](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/11170222) Preferred formulations include chewables (as swallowing tablets may be difficult on MDMA) and Emergen-C drink mixes (killing two birds with one stone and staying hydrated)

500mg every three hours, starting ~3 hours before taking MDMA and finishing 6-7 hours afterwards (total of 2,000mg) Higher doses of vitamin C (2,000-6,000mg) [may cause gastrointestinal problems.](https://examine.com/supplements/vitamin-c/) If you know you can take more vitamin C without GI issues, consider taking 250-500mg every ~1-2 hours instead, as smaller but more frequent doses may be more effective
The information provided is only a means to raise awareness and should not be construed as medical advice. Always consult with your doctor before taking supplements.
